mapper.update:
update BOS.BAS_ZONEINFO
ZONECODE = #{zonecode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ZONENAME = #{zonename,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ZONEPEOPLE = #{zonepeople,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
TELPHONE = #{telphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SUBORDINATEUNIT = #{subordinateunit,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update BOS.BAS_ZONEINFO set ZONECODE = #{zonecode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ZONENAME = #{zonename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ZONEPEOPLE = #{zonepeople,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, TELPHONE = #{telphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SUBORDINATEUNIT = #{subordinateunit,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
